tool_description: This API allows you to follow the price of cryptocurrencies in live.
name: Cryptocurrency Price
title: Cryptocurrency Price

api_list.name: Get the price of Cryptocurrencies
api_list.description: This will return the current prices of cryptocurrencies along with different characteristics.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-price.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-price.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
